name: ProfoundImpairmentBothEyes
title: Profound Impairment, Both Eyes
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of profound impairment of both eyes.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of blindness in both eyes, which Includes blindness categories 3, 4 or 5.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')
